仗.definition: weaponry; to hold (a weapon); to wield; to rely on; to depend on; war; battle

仗勢欺人.definition: to take advantage of one's position to bully people (idiom); to kick people around

仗恃.definition: to rely on; to depend on

仗義.definition: to uphold justice; to be loyal (to one's friends); to stick by

仗義執言.definition: to speak out for justice (idiom); to take a stand on a matter of principle

仗義疏財.definition: to help the needy for justice (idiom); to be loyal to one's friends and generous to the needy

仗腰.definition: to back sb up; to support (from the rear)
